item.title: Report E-2025040454
item.description:
Report E-2025040454

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-16
  • City: WALTON
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: DAYTON FREIGHT LINES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Dayton Freight personnel observed approximately three (3) quarts of material released from three (3) 1-quart metal cans from one (1) box due to a forklift accident that resulted in the cans being punctured. The released material impacted the trailer floor. Dayton Freight personnel deployed granular absorbents to the impacted area and gathered the spent material and containerized it into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum. The damaged containers were contained into one (1) 5-gallon poly drum. The generated waste was staged onsite at the terminal in a secure location. The generated waste will remain onsite for Dayton Freight’s contracted hazardous waste vendor to coordinate disposal.

item.title: Report X-2025040642
item.description:
Report X-2025040642

Identified by scraper @ 2025-05-18T21:15:32+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-04-05
  • City: LOUISVILLE
  • State: KY
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: AT THE UPS WORLDPORT FACILITY IN LOUISVILLE, KENTUCKY, A THREE DAY SELECT AIR PACKAGE REQUIRED PACKAGE REWRAP. UPON INSPECTION OF THE CONTENTS DISCOVERED FOUR CANS OF FALCON DUST-OFF ELECTRONICS COMPRESSED GAS DUSTER, EACH CAN AT 10 OZ CAPACITY. THERE ARE NO DANGEROUS GOODS MARKS OR LABELS ON THE OUTER PACKAGE. THERMAL TRACKING LABEL REFERENCE SECTION INDICATES 4 BOTTLE FALCON DUST-OFF COMPRE. THIS PACKAGE WAS DROPPED OFF IN TEXAS USING UPS ACCOUNT NUMBER 5RE698, ESSENDANT, 5440 STATIONERS WAY, SACRAMENTO CA 95842-1900.
